timeline.content:
Hi Mariana, 
Good Day

Rachna Ahuja this side on behalf of *University College London* powered by Amber 

 I will be happy to help you in booking the right accommodation for you. 

Thanks

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello? I just received a call. Yeah, am I speaking with Mariana? Yeah, yeah, yeah. Mariana, this is Rachna calling on behalf of University College London. We received your inquiry for the property I.Q. tufnell House. Oh, yeah, yeah. You were looking for the bronze on suit plus for 20 weeks at 350 pounds per week, if I'm not wrong.
Speaker B: Yeah, that one. That one, yeah, sure.
Speaker A: So, just wanted to know that, you know, you're looking just for 20 weeks. Is it like you're moving just for 20 weeks or you just need it, you know, for a shorter duration?
Speaker B: I would be moving for 15 weeks at most. 14. 15. That's why I asked if I could move out before the 20 weeks.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. So you're going for a very shorter duration. That the thing, right?
Speaker B: Yes, yes.
Speaker A: Okay. You can opt for the 20 weeks. Like the move in date. The 6th of September was like two days away from today and the move out is the 24th of January, 2026.
Speaker B: Yeah, okay.
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah. Just wanted to know, like, do you want to proceed with that?
Speaker B: No, I think I'll continue looking, but thank you.
Speaker A: No problem. If you feel that you are ready with something, or if you feel that this is the option which you have finalized or any of it, you can reach out to me.
Speaker B: Okay, thank you.
Speaker A: Thank you. Bye.
Speaker B: Thank you. Have a nice one.
